CustomField.description: The automatic Status of the Campaign Member for Closed/Won opportunities that have a Primary Contact and a Primary Campaign Source associated with them. If left blank, Salesforce uses the first Responded status.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The default status you want NPSP to use on Campaign Members for Closed/Won Opportunities that have a Primary Contact and a Primary Campaign Source associated with them. If you leave this blank, NPSP uses the first Responded status.
CustomField.label: Campaign Member Responded Status
